website_summaries.verdict: If you need shower shoes but need arch support as well, consider these flip-flops from Crocs.
pros: All-in-one design with no crevices for mold
cons: May run small, so consider sizing up when ordering

customer_reviews.title: Not the same
customer_reviews.text: These are not the same Kadee 11 flip flops....not as roomy and much more narrow....boo hoo I odered a pair for my friends birthday because her feet are more wide and hard to get the right shoes...I thought these would be perfect because I don't wear narrow I'm average but they are roomy...Not going to work for her and too narrow for me now!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Does not run true to size
customer_reviews.text: These crocs run very small. They are short in length and the toe bridge was tight. I ordered a size 10 and ended up giving them to my granddaughter who wears a size 8. They fit her perfectly. Would not recommend unless you size up.
customer_reviews.author: C. Amato

customer_reviews.title: They offer great support and are super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I just ordered my 4th pair of these flip flops. I purchase a pair every spring and wear them all summer long. They offer great support and are super comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda

customer_reviews.title: The shoes are nice and comfortable as well as durable
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are nice and comfortable as well as durable. Go a size up from your normal shoe size.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Slike

customer_reviews.title: Shrink in the sun
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a pair of these crocs and they shrunk at least three sizes from the sun. They are unwearable now for me. I will have to give them away. My husband and his sister thought I was losing my mind. In the reviews I saw that it has happened to three other people as well and another person had asked a question about shrinking because her pair shrank two sizes. Tina answered on July 10, 2018
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Not like the old Crocs.
customer_reviews.text: Runs small. Definitely get a whole size bigger. I was disappointed in how thin and flimsy these were, especially compared to my old Crocs flip flops that finally broke. I had those for many years. The bottom toe part curves up on the sole and stays that way when you walk, Very annoying. This isn't much different from the cheap flip flops you can buy at discount stores.
customer_reviews.author: A. Liu

customer_reviews.title: Crocs for women kadee ll flip flops
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size 8 for myself I was disappointed, I have a narrow foot and they were tight. I ordered a size 11 for my daughter there is no way that they fit. Crocs women s Kadee 11 flip flops.
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: No arch support!
customer_reviews.text: Cute to look at, but paper thin with no arch support or cushion. One of my patients came in wearing OOFOS yesterday, a brand I had never heard of before. She had just finished a marathon and the OOFOS were her go to post run recovery foot wear. Waiting for mine to arrive since the Crocs are on their way back to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with Crocs Women's Kadee II Flip-Flops. Just as described. Great fit and very comfortable. Good choice.
customer_reviews.author: gobirds2

customer_reviews.title: Had to sadly return as they are super cute.
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 pairs based on a recommendation from a friend. Very narrow with the side “snap” rubbing causing blisters. Had to sadly return as they are super cute.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Knox

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: More comfortable than I thought. Happy with these, “go-to” “utility flip flops!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Crocs Women's Kadee II Flip Flop | Casual Sandal | Water and Beach Shoe | Lightweight
product_meta.description: Everybody needs a casual, basic flip — we’ve just made the Kadee II a little prettier. It has sleeker, slimmer straps and the Croslite foam cushion you love. It’s light, versatile and ready for fun whenever you are.
feature_bullets: DESIGN: These flips are constructed using a fully molded Croslite material for signature Crocs comfort. It boasts a soft TPU toe post for added comfort and it's simple but sleek feminine straps make it the perfect everyday flip for her!
BENEFITS: These flips are lightweight, durable, odor-resistant, easy to clean with soap and water, and quick to dry
WHAT SIZE SHOULD I BUY? If you are shopping for a 1/2 size, we suggest ordering up to the next largest whole size

WHERE DO I WEAR THESE? These shoes are the perfect summer shoe! They are great for the beach, pool, boat, BBQ, picnic or any other warm-weather activity! They are lightweight and comfortable making them the ideal travel and vacation sandal!
WHO CAN WEAR THESE? These shoes are loved by women of all ages! Dress them up or down - they are perfect for any wearing occasion!
